thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 7 of 523
thread.title: Suzanne McCrady

author: Suzanne McCrady
title: Suzanne McCrady
text: I would have given the experience 5 stars if it were not for their 10% restocking fee which adds up for a$90 dress plus $8.00 to return as well.That is almost$17 off the amount of the returned dress. I ordered 2 sizes as I had no idea what size my granddaughter would need. There was not enough time to order, send back and reorder. Of course, if you want a store credit then you do not have to pay a restocking fee, but you tie up your money for who knows how long? That fee may stop me from ordering again? Other than that we were very pleased!
